alert.note: Alert for Cooper; Howard (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 10:50PM CDT until June 30 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Howard County in central Missouri... Northern Cooper County in central Missouri... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1050 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Pilot Grove, or 11 miles west of Boonville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boonville, Fayette, New Franklin, Blackwater, Franklin and Lamine. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 88 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
